text.instruction:
----------------------------------------------------------------
PROFILE OR ACCOUNT RELATED ISSUES RESOLUTION INSTRUCTIONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

**ALWAYS follow the below steps INORDER for profile or account related issue resolution. Do not merge or skip any steps.**
1. Begin by apologizing for the inconvenience and thank the user for bringing the account issue to attention.
2. If missing, request clarification regarding the specific issue type, such as:
   - login failure
   - data loss
   - incorrect progress or level state
   - linking or sync errors
   (Request only the category of issue, not sensitive information.)
3. Review if any available information from **Platform Information** or **Player Information** can be used to identify relevant insights, confirmations, or known conditions related to the account issue.
   Do not speculate or infer beyond what is supported by the data.
4. If no actionable insight is available, request ONLY non-sensitive information that may help understand the account context, such as:
   - username or display name (if safe and already shared by the user)
   - device type or platform
   - approximate time the issue was observed
   (Remind the user not to share passwords, OTPs, payment details, or private credentials. Never ask for them.)
5. Offer basic troubleshooting steps when applicable, such as:
   - restarting the app or device
   - clearing cache (if platform-specific and applicable)
   - checking for available app updates
   - verifying network connection
   (Do not reference internal systems or troubleshooting sources.)
6. If the issue persists after troubleshooting or the user confirms troubleshooting has already been attempted:
   - Follow the escalation guidelines and escalate by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool using the **outside_ai_agent_capability** fallback config.
      - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the current analysis.
      - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to deliver a reassuring message to the user that their account data and progress are important and safe, and thank them for their patience and support and that the issue requires deeper investigation.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.
7. If issue is resolved through troubleshooting or clarification, resolve the issue by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool with **display_content** tool parameter value as confirming resolution with the user and thanking them for their understanding.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (passwords, OTPs, financial info, full names, emails, etc.).
- Never imply access to internal account management or verification systems.
- Never state with certainty that data is safe unless confirmed by validated information.
- Never provide timelines or guarantees regarding restoration or recovery.
- Never dismiss concerns or minimize user experience.

Did any of these steps help you log in?

user_message: I am facing this in my samsung s21 android
agent_response: Thank you for providing your device details. For your Samsung S21, please try fully restarting the game. You can do this by opening your recent apps list, finding the game, and swiping it away to close it. Then, open the game again. Does this solve the lag issue?

faqs_list.title: Why can’t I update the app?
faqs_list.faq_body: The issues might be caused by a few reasons. First, make sure that your Internet connection is good and updates are not blocked because you’re on 4G/LTE and not on Wi-Fi. Second, make sure that your device has enough storage space to download the update. Another thing is that the app is pending in the queue (the most common issue on Android devices). Follow the steps below to clear the downloading queue: Open Play Store app. Swipe-in from the right edge of the screen, and select My apps & games. Here you’ll see all apps that are currently downloading on your phone. To cancel an app from downloading, select it and touch the X (cross icon) near the download progress bar to cancel download for the app. You can do this for all apps to clear the download queue. After that, please try to update the game again.

faqs_list.title: How to restart / reload the app?
faqs_list.faq_body: In order to successfully reload the app, you simply need to close and start the app again. This process enables the game to reload fresh data from our servers. However, since mobile operating systems often keep the app open even if we minimize the game, the game never really closes, thus it is recommended to perform this ‘reloading’ action from time to time. It is very simple to do. To make sure the game is really closed, I attach a simple instruction on how to proceed, depending on your mobile system: If you run an Apple Device: Simply double tap your home button Find the game among your open apps Perform a swipe up gesture on the game tile ( or touch a red X button, depending on iOS version.) If you run an Android Phone ( anything not Apple): G o into your recent apps list by tapping the square button on screen ( can also be two 90 degree-angles icon on Samsung Phones) Find the game among your open apps Tap and hold the app and swipe it to the right. After that, simply start the game again, and all should be loaded up with fresh data.

faqs_list.faq_body: How can I use the Webshop for Huuuge Casino on Android? The Webshop delivers more chips, bigger bundles, and better value—all from your Android browser. Sign In Options Choose between Facebook, Apple ID, or Sign in with Huuuge Casino App . Verify via App Tap Sign in with Huuuge Casino App , then Authenticate Me Now . The app will open, verify your account, and return you to the store. Welcome to the Webshop Swipe through featured banners or scroll for unbeatable bundles. Checkout Tap on a deal, select your payment option, and complete the transaction securely. Collect In-Game Rewards Tap Go to Game and retrieve your chips from the Congratulations screen. Pin the Store Tap + Add to Home Screen for instant access in the future. Support is always available if you need help. Enjoy those bonus chips!

Second, make sure that your device has enough storage space to download the update. Another thing is that the app is pending in the queue (the most common issue on Android devices). Follow the steps below to clear the downloading queue: Open Play Store app. Swipe-in from the right edge of the screen, and select My apps & games. Here you’ll see all apps that are currently downloading on your phone. To cancel an app from downloading, select it and touch the X (cross icon) near the download progress bar to cancel download for the app. You can do this for all apps to clear the download queue. After that, please try to update the game again.

faqs_list.title: How to restart / reload the app?
faqs_list.faq_body: In order to successfully reload the app, you simply need to close and start the app again. This process enables the game to reload fresh data from our servers. However, since mobile operating systems often keep the app open even if we minimize the game, the game never really closes, thus it is recommended to perform this ‘reloading’ action from time to time. It is very simple to do. To make sure the game is really closed, I attach a simple instruction on how to proceed, depending on your mobile system: If you run an Apple Device: Simply double tap your home button Find the game among your open apps Perform a swipe up gesture on the game tile ( or touch a red X button, depending on iOS version.) If you run an Android Phone ( anything not Apple): G o into your recent apps list by tapping the square button on screen ( can also be two 90 degree-angles icon on Samsung Phones) Find the game among your open apps Tap and hold the app and swipe it to the right. After that, simply start the game again, and all should be loaded up with fresh data.

faqs_list.title: The Webshop - a step by step guide for Android players
faqs_list.faq_body: How can I use the Webshop for Huuuge Casino on Android? The Webshop delivers more chips, bigger bundles, and better value—all from your Android browser. Step-by-Step Guide: Open Chrome Go to webshop.huuugecasino.com using Chrome. Agree to Terms Review and accept the terms and conditions to unlock login options. Sign In Options Choose between Facebook, Apple ID, or Sign in with Huuuge Casino App . Verify via App Tap Sign in with Huuuge Casino App , then Authenticate Me Now . The app will open, verify your account, and return you to the store. Welcome to the Webshop Swipe through featured banners or scroll for unbeatable bundles. Checkout Tap on a deal, select your payment option, and complete the transaction securely. Collect In-Game Rewards Tap Go to Game and retrieve your chips from the Congratulations screen. Pin the Store Tap + Add to Home Screen for instant access in the future. Support is always available if you need help. Enjoy those bonus chips!

text.instruction:
----------------------------------------------------------------
PROFILE OR ACCOUNT RELATED ISSUES RESOLUTION INSTRUCTIONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

**ALWAYS follow the below steps INORDER for profile or account related issue resolution. Do not merge or skip any steps.**
1. Begin by apologizing for the inconvenience and thank the user for bringing the account issue to attention.
2. If missing, request clarification regarding the specific issue type, such as:
   - login failure
   - data loss
   - incorrect progress or level state
   - linking or sync errors
   (Request only the category of issue, not sensitive information.)
3. Review if any available information from **Platform Information** or **Player Information** can be used to identify relevant insights, confirmations, or known conditions related to the account issue.
   Do not speculate or infer beyond what is supported by the data.
4. If no actionable insight is available, request ONLY non-sensitive information that may help understand the account context, such as:
   - username or display name (if safe and already shared by the user)
   - device type or platform
   - approximate time the issue was observed
   (Remind the user not to share passwords, OTPs, payment details, or private credentials. Never ask for them.)
5. Offer basic troubleshooting steps when applicable, such as:
   - restarting the app or device
   - clearing cache (if platform-specific and applicable)
   - checking for available app updates
   - verifying network connection
   (Do not reference internal systems or troubleshooting sources.)
6. If the issue persists after troubleshooting or the user confirms troubleshooting has already been attempted:
   - Follow the escalation guidelines and escalate by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool using the **outside_ai_agent_capability** fallback config.
      - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the current analysis.
      - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to deliver a reassuring message to the user that their account data and progress are important and safe, and thank them for their patience and support and that the issue requires deeper investigation.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.
7. If issue is resolved through troubleshooting or clarification, resolve the issue by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool with **display_content** tool parameter value as confirming resolution with the user and thanking them for their understanding.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (passwords, OTPs, financial info, full names, emails, etc.).
- Never imply access to internal account management or verification systems.
- Never state with certainty that data is safe unless confirmed by validated information.
- Never provide timelines or guarantees regarding restoration or recovery.
- Never dismiss concerns or minimize user experience.

text.instruction:
----------------------------------------------------------------
PURCHASE OR PAYMENT ISSUE RESOLUTION INSTRUCTIONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

**ALWAYS follow the below steps in order for purchase or payment issue resolution. Do not merge or skip any steps.**
1. Begin by thanking the user for supporting the game and apologize for the inconvenience.
2. If purchase details are missing, request ONLY non-sensitive information, such as:
   - approximate purchase date
   - item name
   - platform or storefront
   - approximate purchase amount
   **Note: Never request or confirm sensitive information or payment credentials.**
3. Review if any available information from **Platform Information** or **Player Information** along with the purchase details can be used to identify relevant insights, confirmations, or errors regarding the purchase.
   DO NOT speculate or infer missing information.
4. If no relevant information is available, perform FAQ search by calling the `get_faqs` tool to see if FAQ results can be used to provide a resolution.
5. If even FAQ results cannot provide any resolution, advise the user to review their bank or app-store transaction history to confirm whether the payment succeeded or failed.
   Do not reference internal systems, knowledge sources, FAQ results or troubleshooting origins.
6. If the transaction/payment was succeeded on the user’s side:
   - Follow the escalation guidelines and escalate by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool using the **outside_ai_agent_capability** fallback config.
      - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the current analysis.
      - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to deliver a reassuring message to the user that their payment is secure and currently being verified.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.
7. If the transaction failed on the user’s side:
   - Reject the issue by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool.
      - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the failure condition.
      - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to construct a user response as respectfully informing the user that no completed purchase is recorded and asking them to check with their payment provider if needed.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (bank details, card numbers, emails, IDs, full names, etc.).
- Never claim access to financial systems or banking records.
- Never confirm root cause unless explicitly supported by validated data.
- Never generalize or guess about loss, refunds, charge status, or timing.
- Never imply certainty about refund or transaction status without confirmation.

To help me understand the situation better, could you please provide a few more details? I'll need the approximate date of the purchase, the name of the item, and the platform you were using.

text.instruction:
----------------------------------------------------------------
PROFILE OR ACCOUNT RELATED ISSUES RESOLUTION INSTRUCTIONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

**ALWAYS follow the below steps INORDER for profile or account related issue resolution. Do not merge or skip any steps.**
1. Begin by apologizing for the inconvenience and thank the user for bringing the account issue to attention.
2. If missing, request clarification regarding the specific issue type, such as:
   - login failure
   - data loss
   - incorrect progress or level state
   - linking or sync errors
   (Request only the category of issue, not sensitive information.)
3. Review if any available information from **Platform Information** or **Player Information** can be used to identify relevant insights, confirmations, or known conditions related to the account issue.
   Do not speculate or infer beyond what is supported by the data.
4. If no actionable insight is available, request ONLY non-sensitive information that may help understand the account context, such as:
   - username or display name (if safe and already shared by the user)
   - device type or platform
   - approximate time the issue was observed
   (Remind the user not to share passwords, OTPs, payment details, or private credentials. Never ask for them.)
5. Offer basic troubleshooting steps when applicable, such as:
   - restarting the app or device
   - clearing cache (if platform-specific and applicable)
   - checking for available app updates
   - verifying network connection
   (Do not reference internal systems or troubleshooting sources.)
6. If the issue persists after troubleshooting or the user confirms troubleshooting has already been attempted:
   - Follow the escalation guidelines and escalate by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool using the **outside_ai_agent_capability** fallback config.
      - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the current analysis.
      - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to deliver a reassuring message to the user that their account data and progress are important and safe, and thank them for their patience and support and that the issue requires deeper investigation.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.
7. If issue is resolved through troubleshooting or clarification, resolve the issue by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool with **display_content** tool parameter value as confirming resolution with the user and thanking them for their understanding.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (passwords, OTPs, financial info, full names, emails, etc.).
- Never imply access to internal account management or verification systems.
- Never state with certainty that data is safe unless confirmed by validated information.
- Never provide timelines or guarantees regarding restoration or recovery.
- Never dismiss concerns or minimize user experience.

text.instruction:
----------------------------------------------------------------
MISSING REWARDS RESOLUTION INSTRUCTIONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

**ALWAYS follow the below steps INORDER for missing rewards resolution. Do not merge or skip any steps.**
1. Begin by apologizing for the missing rewards experience and thank the user for reporting it.
2. Request clarification on the reward type if not already provided:
   - Ask whether the missing rewards are from "Battle Awards" or "Alliance Contributions".
   - Do not continue until the reward type is confirmed.
3. If the user confirms "Battle Awards":
   - Request any additional non-sensitive details relevant to the issue if not already provided, such as when the rewards were expected or whether similar rewards have been received before.
   - Reassure the user that you are reviewing the issue.
   - If validated details are available confirming the loss, proceed to Step 6.
   - If no relevant detail is available, offer basic checks such as restarting the game or confirming they are on the latest version.
   - If the issue persists:
      - Follow the escalation guidelines and escalate by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool using the **outside_ai_agent_capability** fallback config.
         - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the current analysis
         - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to inform the user to not worry and that their progress is safe, and that you have escalated their issue for further review
     - Do not speculate or attempt to verify reward status beyond available data.
4. If the user confirms "Alliance Contributions":
   - Review any available information in **Player Information** to identify whether rewards were expected or may be pending based on game timing or contributions.
   - If no relevant information is available, advise restarting the game, as visual delays may occur.
   - If the issue persists after restart or confirmation:
      - Follow the escalation guidelines and escalate by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool using the **outside_ai_agent_capability** fallback config.
         - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the current analysis
         - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to inform the user to not worry and that their progress is safe, and that you have escalated their issue for further review
5. If both reward types are impacted or unclear:
   - Request clarification.
   - If both reward types are confirmed missing:
      - Follow the escalation guidelines and escalate by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool using the **outside_ai_agent_capability** fallback config.
         - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the current analysis
         - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to inform the user to not worry and that their progress is safe, and that you have escalated their issue for further review
6. If the issue is resolved or rewards are confirmed received:
   - Thank the user and acknowledge completion.
   - Ask whether they require any further assistance before resolving the issue by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (emails, names, account IDs, financial info, etc.).
- Never guarantee reward recovery unless supported by validated data.
- Never imply access to internal systems or financial records.
- Never provide technical or internal workflow details.
- Never speculate on causes or timelines.

I'm sorry you're having trouble logging into your account. Thank you for letting me know.

I see you're playing on a Desktop with Mac OS version 10.15.7 and using the Chrome browser.

Please try these basic troubleshooting steps:
1. Restart your Chrome browser.
2. Clear your browser's cache.
3. Check for any available updates for your browser.
4. Verify your internet connection.

Let me know if the issue persists after trying these steps.

text.instruction:
----------------------------------------------------------------
PROFILE OR ACCOUNT RELATED ISSUES RESOLUTION INSTRUCTIONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

**ALWAYS follow the below steps INORDER for profile or account related issue resolution. Do not merge or skip any steps.**
1. Begin by apologizing for the inconvenience and thank the user for bringing the account issue to attention.
2. If missing, request clarification regarding the specific issue type, such as:
   - login failure
   - data loss
   - incorrect progress or level state
   - linking or sync errors
   (Request only the category of issue, not sensitive information.)
3. Review if any available information from **Platform Information** or **Player Information** can be used to identify relevant insights, confirmations, or known conditions related to the account issue.
   Do not speculate or infer beyond what is supported by the data.
4. If no actionable insight is available, request ONLY non-sensitive information that may help understand the account context, such as:
   - username or display name (if safe and already shared by the user)
   - device type or platform
   - approximate time the issue was observed
   (Remind the user not to share passwords, OTPs, payment details, or private credentials. Never ask for them.)
5. Offer basic troubleshooting steps when applicable, such as:
   - restarting the app or device
   - clearing cache (if platform-specific and applicable)
   - checking for available app updates
   - verifying network connection
   (Do not reference internal systems or troubleshooting sources.)
6. If the issue persists after troubleshooting or the user confirms troubleshooting has already been attempted:
   - Follow the escalation guidelines and escalate by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool using the **outside_ai_agent_capability** fallback config.
      - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the current analysis.
      - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to deliver a reassuring message to the user that their account data and progress are important and safe, and thank them for their patience and support and that the issue requires deeper investigation.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.
7. If issue is resolved through troubleshooting or clarification, resolve the issue by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool with **display_content** tool parameter value as confirming resolution with the user and thanking them for their understanding.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (passwords, OTPs, financial info, full names, emails, etc.).
- Never imply access to internal account management or verification systems.
- Never state with certainty that data is safe unless confirmed by validated information.
- Never provide timelines or guarantees regarding restoration or recovery.
- Never dismiss concerns or minimize user experience.

text.instruction:
----------------------------------------------------------------
PROFILE OR ACCOUNT RELATED ISSUES RESOLUTION INSTRUCTIONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

**ALWAYS follow the below steps INORDER for profile or account related issue resolution. Do not merge or skip any steps.**
1. Begin by apologizing for the inconvenience and thank the user for bringing the account issue to attention.
2. If missing, request clarification regarding the specific issue type, such as:
   - login failure
   - data loss
   - incorrect progress or level state
   - linking or sync errors
   (Request only the category of issue, not sensitive information.)
3. Review if any available information from **Platform Information** or **Player Information** can be used to identify relevant insights, confirmations, or known conditions related to the account issue.
   Do not speculate or infer beyond what is supported by the data.
4. If no actionable insight is available, request ONLY non-sensitive information that may help understand the account context, such as:
   - username or display name (if safe and already shared by the user)
   - device type or platform
   - approximate time the issue was observed
   (Remind the user not to share passwords, OTPs, payment details, or private credentials. Never ask for them.)
5. Offer basic troubleshooting steps when applicable, such as:
   - restarting the app or device
   - clearing cache (if platform-specific and applicable)
   - checking for available app updates
   - verifying network connection
   (Do not reference internal systems or troubleshooting sources.)
6. If the issue persists after troubleshooting or the user confirms troubleshooting has already been attempted:
   - Follow the escalation guidelines and escalate by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool using the **outside_ai_agent_capability** fallback config.
      - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the current analysis.
      - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to deliver a reassuring message to the user that their account data and progress are important and safe, and thank them for their patience and support and that the issue requires deeper investigation.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.
7. If issue is resolved through troubleshooting or clarification, resolve the issue by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool with **display_content** tool parameter value as confirming resolution with the user and thanking them for their understanding.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (passwords, OTPs, financial info, full names, emails, etc.).
- Never imply access to internal account management or verification systems.
- Never state with certainty that data is safe unless confirmed by validated information.
- Never provide timelines or guarantees regarding restoration or recovery.
- Never dismiss concerns or minimize user experience.

user_message: thanks , how to update profile ? and i want to know how to add / remove friends ?
agent_response:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help with the login issue.

To update your profile, you can change your avatar, frame, and email address.

To change your avatar and frame:
1.  Go to your personal profile section.
2.  Tap 'Edit Profile'.
3.  Click on your current avatar image to choose a new one.
4.  Next to the Avatars tab, you can select a frame.
You can also connect your account to Facebook to use your Facebook profile picture as your in-game avatar.

To change your email address, you will need to do so through your Facebook profile's General Account Settings, as that is where the game gets your email information.

Does this solve question 1?

faqs_list.title: Why can’t I update the app?
faqs_list.faq_body: The issues might be caused by a few reasons. First, make sure that your Internet connection is good and updates are not blocked because you’re on 4G/LTE and not on Wi-Fi. Second, make sure that your device has enough storage space to download the update. Another thing is that the app is pending in the queue (the most common issue on Android devices). Follow the steps below to clear the downloading queue: Open Play Store app. Swipe-in from the right edge of the screen, and select My apps & games. Here you’ll see all apps that are currently downloading on your phone. To cancel an app from downloading, select it and touch the X (cross icon) near the download progress bar to cancel download for the app. You can do this for all apps to clear the download queue. After that, please try to update the game again.

faqs_list.title: 🖼️ How to Change Your Avatar & Frame
faqs_list.faq_body: 🖼️ How to Change Your Avatar & Frame 🎆 Express Your Gaming Personality Ready to showcase your unique style? Customizing your avatar and frame is the perfect way to stand out and express your gaming personality! 🚀 Avatar Customization Process 📱 Enter Your Profile: Navigate to your personal profile section ✏️ Tap 'Edit Profile': Access your customization options 🖼️ Click Your Picture: Tap on your current avatar image ✨ Choose Your Style: Browse and select the avatar that represents you 🖼️ Frame Selection Don't forget about frames! On the tab next to Avatars, you can pick the perfect frame to complement your chosen avatar and complete your unique look. 📸 Custom Facebook Avatar Option Want something truly personal? Here's an exciting option: 🔗 Sync with Facebook: Connect your account to Facebook 📸 Use Your Photo: Set your Facebook profile picture as your in-game avatar ✨ Personal Touch: Show your real personality in the game Create a look that's uniquely you and let your personality shine in every game! 🎆

faqs_list.title: How to change my email address?
faqs_list.faq_body: In order to change your email address, you need to do it via Facebook - because this platform is providing the email to us. Simply go to your Facebook profile and change the address in General Account Settings. If you need help with that actions, please feel free to visit Facebook Help Center: Here!

faqs_list.title: Why can’t I update the app?
faqs_list.faq_body: The issues might be caused by a few reasons. First, make sure that your Internet connection is good and updates are not blocked because you’re on 4G/LTE and not on Wi-Fi. Second, make sure that your device has enough storage space to download the update. Another thing is that the app is pending in the queue (the most common issue on Android devices). Follow the steps below to clear the downloading queue: Open Play Store app. Swipe-in from the right edge of the screen, and select My apps & games. Here you’ll see all apps that are currently downloading on your phone. To cancel an app from downloading, select it and touch the X (cross icon) near the download progress bar to cancel download for the app. You can do this for all apps to clear the download queue. After that, please try to update the game again.

faqs_list.title: 🖼️ How to Change Your Avatar & Frame
faqs_list.faq_body: 🖼️ How to Change Your Avatar & Frame 🎆 Express Your Gaming Personality Ready to showcase your unique style? Customizing your avatar and frame is the perfect way to stand out and express your gaming personality! 🚀 Avatar Customization Process 📱 Enter Your Profile: Navigate to your personal profile section ✏️ Tap 'Edit Profile': Access your customization options 🖼️ Click Your Picture: Tap on your current avatar image ✨ Choose Your Style: Browse and select the avatar that represents you 🖼️ Frame Selection Don't forget about frames! On the tab next to Avatars, you can pick the perfect frame to complement your chosen avatar and complete your unique look. 📸 Custom Facebook Avatar Option Want something truly personal? Here's an exciting option: 🔗 Sync with Facebook: Connect your account to Facebook 📸 Use Your Photo: Set your Facebook profile picture as your in-game avatar ✨ Personal Touch: Show your real personality in the game Create a look that's uniquely you and let your personality shine in every game! 🎆

faqs_list.title: How to change my email address?
faqs_list.faq_body: In order to change your email address, you need to do it via Facebook - because this platform is providing the email to us. Simply go to your Facebook profile and change the address in General Account Settings. If you need help with that actions, please feel free to visit Facebook Help Center: Here!

agent_info.agent_input: thanks , how to update profile ? and i want to know how to add / remove friends ?
agent_info.agent_output:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help with the login issue.

To update your profile, you can change your avatar, frame, and email address.

To change your avatar and frame:
1.  Go to your personal profile section.
2.  Tap 'Edit Profile'.
3.  Click on your current avatar image to choose a new one.
4.  Next to the Avatars tab, you can select a frame.
You can also connect your account to Facebook to use your Facebook profile picture as your in-game avatar.

To change your email address, you will need to do so through your Facebook profile's General Account Settings, as that is where the game gets your email information.

Does this solve question 1?

2. If missing, request clarification regarding the specific issue type, such as:
   - login failure
   - data loss
   - incorrect progress or level state
   - linking or sync errors
   (Request only the category of issue, not sensitive information.)
3. Review if any available information from **Platform Information** or **Player Information** can be used to identify relevant insights, confirmations, or known conditions related to the account issue.
   Do not speculate or infer beyond what is supported by the data.
4. If no actionable insight is available, request ONLY non-sensitive information that may help understand the account context, such as:
   - username or display name (if safe and already shared by the user)
   - device type or platform
   - approximate time the issue was observed
   (Remind the user not to share passwords, OTPs, payment details, or private credentials. Never ask for them.)
5. Offer basic troubleshooting steps when applicable, such as:
   - restarting the app or device
   - clearing cache (if platform-specific and applicable)
   - checking for available app updates
   - verifying network connection
   (Do not reference internal systems or troubleshooting sources.)
6. If the issue persists after troubleshooting or the user confirms troubleshooting has already been attempted:
   - Follow the escalation guidelines and escalate by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool using the **outside_ai_agent_capability** fallback config.
      - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the current analysis.
      - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to deliver a reassuring message to the user that their account data and progress are important and safe, and thank them for their patience and support and that the issue requires deeper investigation.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.
7. If issue is resolved through troubleshooting or clarification, resolve the issue by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool with **display_content** tool parameter value as confirming resolution with the user and thanking them for their understanding.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (passwords, OTPs, financial info, full names, emails, etc.).
- Never imply access to internal account management or verification systems.
- Never state with certainty that data is safe unless confirmed by validated information.
- Never provide timelines or guarantees regarding restoration or recovery.
- Never dismiss concerns or minimize user experience.

faqs_list.title: How can I invite friends to the table?
faqs_list.faq_body: If you want to play together with your friends, you can invite them to your table. Of course, if there are free seats. You can also start a private table to have all the seats free.

text.instruction:
----------------------------------------------------------------
GAMEPLAY BUGS OR GLITCHES RESOLUTION INSTRUCTIONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

**ALWAYS follow the below steps INORDER for gameplay bug or glitches resolution. Do not merge or skip any steps.**
1. Begin by apologizing for the bug or glitch experience and thank the user for reporting it.
2. If missing, request ONLY non-sensitive gameplay details needed to analyze the issue, such as:
   - what they experienced
   - when the issue occurred
   - whether it appears device- or platform-specific
   - whether it happens consistently or intermittently
   (Never request or confirm sensitive information.)
3. Review if any available information from **Platform Information** or **Player Information** can be used to identify relevant insights, confirmations, or known behavior related to the bug or glitch.
   DO NOT speculate or infer missing information.
4. If no relevant information is available, perform FAQ search by calling the `get_faqs` tool to see if FAQ results can be used to provide a resolution.
5. If even FAQ results do not provide any resolution, offer basic troubleshooting steps, such as:
   - restarting the game
   - checking for available game or system updates
   - confirming they are running the latest version
   (Do not mention of reference internal systems, FAQs or knowledge sources in your response.)
6. If the issue persists after troubleshooting or the user confirms troubleshooting has already been attempted:
   - Follow the escalation guidelines and escalate by calling the `action_agent_tool` with the **outside_ai_agent_capability** fallback config.
      - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the current analysis including:
         -- reported issue details
         -- symptoms observed
         -- device/platform
         -- troubleshooting attempted
      - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to deliver a reassuring message to the user that their glitch will be resolved soon and their report is valuable, that their issue will be investigated and thanks them for their patience and support.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (emails, names, IDs, phone numbers, financial info, etc.).
- Never imply certainty about cause or fix unless supported by validated data.
- Never promise a specific resolution timeline or guarantee.
- Never minimize user experience or dismiss bug claims.

We've created multiple amazing ways for you to boost your bankroll without spending a dime! 🌟 Daily Free Chip Opportunities ⭐ Daily Bonus: Spin the daily wheel for fantastic chip rewards 💪 Huuuge Workout: Complete workout challenges for bonus chips 📬 Lobby Bonus: Collect special bonuses right from your lobby 🎁 Chips Shop Bonus: Check the shop for free chip opportunities 🚀 Club Event Bonuses: Participate in club events for group rewards 🎫 Free Lottery Tickets ⏰ Every Few Hours: A free bronze lottery ticket is waiting for you 🎰 Auto-Claim: Simply enter the lottery and claim it automatically 🎆 Regular Rewards: Consistent opportunities for lottery prizes 📱 Official Social Media Freebies 🔵 Facebook: facebook.com/HuuugeCasino 🔵 Twitter: twitter.com/huuugecasino 🎁 Exclusive Offers: Special promotions and giveaways ⚠️ Security Reminder ✅ Official Sources Only: Get real freebies only from our app and official channels 🔒 Privacy Protection: We never ask for personal information like phone numbers 📞 Report Scams: Contact Support if you encounter suspicious websites Take advantage of all these amazing free chip opportunities and watch your bankroll grow! 🌟

faqs_list.title: Can I give chips to my friend?
faqs_list.faq_body: Unfortunately, there is no such option. If you want to support your friends help completing Club Events and with a bit of luck, you can also add some Jackpot Bonuses.

faqs_list.title: How can I invite friends to the table?
faqs_list.faq_body: If you want to play together with your friends, you can invite them to your table. Of course, if there are free seats. To invite your friends, just tap on a free seat and pick the friend you’d like to invite. If your friend confirms invitation, the free seat will be taken by him/her. You can also start a private table to have all the seats free.

I apologize for the inconvenience you're experiencing with your login, <PERSON_1>, and thank you for bringing this to my attention.

Since you are using a Desktop with Mac OS 10.15.7 and Chrome, please try these steps:
1. Restart the game application or your device.
2. Clear your browser's cache for Chrome.
3. Check for any available updates for the game or your Chrome browser.
4. Verify your internet connection is stable.

Does this help resolve your login issue?

usecases_list.goal: This usecase is for handling issues to purchase or payment failures
This usecase is for handling issues to bugs or glitches in the gameplay
This usecase is for handling issues related to game rewards
This usecase is for handling issues to the player account or profile

text.instruction:
----------------------------------------------------------------
PROFILE OR ACCOUNT RELATED ISSUES RESOLUTION INSTRUCTIONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

**ALWAYS follow the below steps INORDER for profile or account related issue resolution. Do not merge or skip any steps.**
1. Begin by apologizing for the inconvenience and thank the user for bringing the account issue to attention.
2. If missing, request clarification regarding the specific issue type, such as:
   - login failure
   - data loss
   - incorrect progress or level state
   - linking or sync errors
   (Request only the category of issue, not sensitive information.)
3. Review if any available information from **Platform Information** or **Player Information** can be used to identify relevant insights, confirmations, or known conditions related to the account issue.
   Do not speculate or infer beyond what is supported by the data.
4. If no actionable insight is available, request ONLY non-sensitive information that may help understand the account context, such as:
   - username or display name (if safe and already shared by the user)
   - device type or platform
   - approximate time the issue was observed
   (Remind the user not to share passwords, OTPs, payment details, or private credentials. Never ask for them.)
5. Offer basic troubleshooting steps when applicable, such as:
   - restarting the app or device
   - clearing cache (if platform-specific and applicable)
   - checking for available app updates
   - verifying network connection
   (Do not reference internal systems or troubleshooting sources.)
6. If the issue persists after troubleshooting or the user confirms troubleshooting has already been attempted:
   - Follow the escalation guidelines and escalate by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool using the **outside_ai_agent_capability** fallback config.
      - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the current analysis.
      - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to deliver a reassuring message to the user that their account data and progress are important and safe, and thank them for their patience and support and that the issue requires deeper investigation.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.
7. If issue is resolved through troubleshooting or clarification, resolve the issue by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool with **display_content** tool parameter value as confirming resolution with the user and thanking them for their understanding.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (passwords, OTPs, financial info, full names, emails, etc.).
- Never imply access to internal account management or verification systems.
- Never state with certainty that data is safe unless confirmed by validated information.
- Never provide timelines or guarantees regarding restoration or recovery.
- Never dismiss concerns or minimize user experience.

faqs_list.title: How do I add / remove friends?
faqs_list.faq_body: First, enter the other player’s profile: If you want to invite the player to be your friend, tap the ‘Connect’ button. Keep in mind that the request has to be accepted to make a connection If you are already friends and you want the player to be removed, click on ‘Remove friend’ button

faqs_list.title: How can I invite friends to the table?
faqs_list.faq_body: If you want to play together with your friends, you can invite them to your table. Of course, if there are free seats. To invite your friends, just tap on a free seat and pick the friend you’d like to invite. If your friend confirms invitation, the free seat will be taken by him/her. You can also start a private table to have all the seats free.

faqs_list.title: 🎆 Introducing the Black Lottery!
faqs_list.faq_body: 🌟 Your Premium Gaming Experience Get ready to elevate your gaming adventure with our incredible Black Lottery feature! This isn't just another game addition - it's a premium enhancement designed to take your experience to the next level. The Black Lottery is a spectacular addition to our regular in-game lottery, specially crafted to offer you thrilling opportunities for greater rewards and more exciting gameplay moments! 🎯 Why You'll Love the Black Lottery 🎫 Exclusive Black Lottery Tickets: Your golden keys to premium rewards 🧩 Unique Puzzle Challenges: Complete exclusive puzzles for massive prizes 💰 Substantial Rewards: Win bigger and better than ever before 🎮 Multiple Ways to Play: From missions to wheel spins, every action counts Don't miss out on this incredible excitement - grab your Black Lottery Tickets, complete exclusive puzzles, and watch the amazing rewards roll in! 🌟

faqs_list.title: 🎫 Multi-Play in the Lottery
faqs_list.faq_body: 🎆 Multiply Your Lottery Excitement Ready to supercharge your lottery experience? Multi-play lets you use multiple tickets at once for incredible efficiency and excitement! 🚀 How Multi-Play Magic Works 📱 Tap and Hold: Press and hold the ticket button (bronze, silver, or gold) 🔢 Select Quantity: Hold long enough to see the range of tickets you want to use ✅ Confirm Amount: Tap the corresponding button again to confirm 🎰 Watch the Action: Multiple tickets are drawn into the lottery machine 🎆 Collect Winnings: All your fantastic winnings are displayed together 🌟 Why Multi-Play is Amazing ⚡ Lightning Speed: Use multiple tickets in seconds instead of minutes 🎯 Maximum Efficiency: More chances to win in less time 🎉 Exciting Action: Watch multiple draws happen at once 💰 Combined Rewards: See all your winnings together for maximum satisfaction 🎆 Perfect for Active Players 🔄 Bulk Processing: Handle large ticket collections efficiently ✨ Streamlined Experience: Less clicking, more winning 🎯 Strategic Play: Use different ticket types in bulk Woooho! Multi-play makes lottery gaming faster, more exciting, and incredibly rewarding! 🌟

faqs_list.title: Game is rigged, you just want me to buy chips
faqs_list.faq_body: Hi [Player Name], Thank you for sharing how you feel — I completely understand how discouraging it is when it seems like the game just isn’t giving you a break. That kind of streak can make anyone feel like the odds are stacked against them, and I’m really sorry it’s been so frustrating lately. Please know that no one can change or control wins or losses. Every spin and outcome are random, which means luck can sometimes swing in one direction for longer than we’d like. The system never adjusts results based on purchases or play history — buying chips only adds more playtime, not better odds. I really appreciate that you took the time to share your feelings about this. You’ve clearly put a lot into the game, and I truly hope your next sessions bring you the kind of wins that remind you why you started playing in the first place. 🎰

agent_response:
To complete a mission, follow these steps:

1.  **Find Your Mission**: Look for a Mission banner in the game or check your News Feed section for active Missions.
2.  **Read the Details**: Tap on the Mission banner to see the instructions for what you need to do.
3.  **Check the Timer**: Each Mission has a timer, so plan your gameplay accordingly.
4.  **Complete the Task**: Play the game and complete the specific task described in the Mission.
5.  **Claim Your Rewards**: Once you've completed the task, your rewards will be automatically added to your account.

Here are some pro tips for Mission success:
*   Stay updated by checking your News Feed regularly for new Missions.
*   Manage your time by keeping an eye on Mission timers to prioritize.
*   Focus on one Mission at a time for the best results.
*   Check back often as new Missions appear regularly.

faqs_list.title: 🚀 How to Complete a Mission?
faqs_list.faq_body: Ready to tackle your first Mission? It's easier than you think! Here's your step-by-step guide to Mission success: 📋 Your Mission Roadmap 🔍 Find Your Mission: When you log into the game, you'll see an exciting Mission banner waiting for you! Can't find it? No worries - just check your News Feed section where all active Missions are displayed. 📖 Read the Details: Tap on any Mission banner to see exactly what you need to do. Every Mission comes with clear instructions, so you'll never be left guessing! ⏰ Check the Timer: Each Mission shows you exactly how much time you have left. Plan your gameplay accordingly to make sure you don't miss out on those amazing rewards! 🎮 Complete the Task: Simply play the game and complete the specific task described in your Mission. Whether it's spinning a certain number of times, hitting big wins, or collecting items - just follow the mission description! 🎁 Claim Your Rewards: Once you've completed the task, your fantastic rewards will be automatically added to your account. Time to celebrate your success! 💡 Pro Tips for Mission Success 📱 Stay Updated: Check your News Feed regularly for new Missions and updates ⏱️ Time Management: Keep an eye on Mission timers to prioritize which ones to complete first 🎯 Focus: Concentrate on one Mission at a time for the best results 🔄 Check Back Often: New Missions appear regularly, so there's always something exciting to work toward! Good luck, and happy Mission completing! 🌟

faqs_list.title: 🎯 What are Missions?
faqs_list.faq_body: Get ready for an exciting new way to earn amazing rewards! Missions are special challenges designed to make your gaming experience even more thrilling. Each Mission comes packed with fantastic rewards and gives you clear goals to achieve as you play. 🌟 How Missions Work Every Mission has a specific number of tasks for you to complete. Think of them as your personal gaming challenges! Some Missions are simple with just one goal, while others feature multiple milestones that unlock bigger and better rewards as you progress. 🎁 Multi-Milestone Missions When you see Missions with multiple progress bars, you've discovered our special multi-milestone challenges! These exciting Missions work in two different ways: Instant Rewards: Get your rewards immediately after completing each step - no waiting required! Final Reward: Complete the entire Mission to unlock the ultimate prize. Only the highest completed milestone counts, so aim high! Note: Rewards are granted either at the end of the Mission or when you complete the highest target before time runs out. 🎮 Mission Types You'll Love We've created a variety of exciting Mission types to keep your gameplay fresh and engaging: 💰 Winning Challenges 🎰 Big Wins: Hit those amazing big wins and watch your chip count soar! 🔥 Mega Wins: Go for the mega wins - the bigger, the better! ⭐ Huuuge Wins: Achieve those incredible huuuge wins that make your heart race! 🎊 Jackpots: Strike it lucky with fantastic jackpot wins! 🎯 Gameplay Missions 🔄 Number of Spins: Keep those reels spinning and rack up your spin count 💎 Total Bets: Place your bets and work toward your betting goals 🧩 Puzzle Completion: Show off your puzzle-solving skills 📈 Level-ups: Climb higher and unlock new experiences 🎁 Gifts Bought: Spread the joy by purchasing gifts for friends 🏆 Special Features 🔄 Number of Trades: Engage in trading activities 🎪 Collection Events: Reach specific milestones in collection events ✨ Collect Charm Packs: Gather those magical charm packs 🏅 League Points: Earn points and climb the leaderboards 🎖️ Loyalty Points: Build your loyalty status with every play 💳 Purchases: Support your gameplay with strategic purchases 🚀 Ready to Start? Now that you know all about Missions, it's time to jump in and start completing these exciting challenges! Each Mission you complete brings you closer to amazing rewards and helps you become a true gaming champion. Let's do our best and complete them all! 🌟

text.instruction:
----------------------------------------------------------------
PROFILE OR ACCOUNT RELATED ISSUES RESOLUTION INSTRUCTIONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

**ALWAYS follow the below steps INORDER for profile or account related issue resolution. Do not merge or skip any steps.**
1. Begin by apologizing for the inconvenience and thank the user for bringing the account issue to attention.
2. If missing, request clarification regarding the specific issue type, such as:
   - login failure
   - data loss
   - incorrect progress or level state
   - linking or sync errors
   (Request only the category of issue, not sensitive information.)
3. Review if any available information from **Platform Information** or **Player Information** can be used to identify relevant insights, confirmations, or known conditions related to the account issue.
   Do not speculate or infer beyond what is supported by the data.
4. If no actionable insight is available, request ONLY non-sensitive information that may help understand the account context, such as:
   - username or display name (if safe and already shared by the user)
   - device type or platform
   - approximate time the issue was observed
   (Remind the user not to share passwords, OTPs, payment details, or private credentials. Never ask for them.)
5. Offer basic troubleshooting steps when applicable, such as:
   - restarting the app or device
   - clearing cache (if platform-specific and applicable)
   - checking for available app updates
   - verifying network connection
   (Do not reference internal systems or troubleshooting sources.)
6. If the issue persists after troubleshooting or the user confirms troubleshooting has already been attempted:
   - Follow the escalation guidelines and escalate by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool using the **outside_ai_agent_capability** fallback config.
      - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the current analysis.
      - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to deliver a reassuring message to the user that their account data and progress are important and safe, and thank them for their patience and support and that the issue requires deeper investigation.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.
7. If issue is resolved through troubleshooting or clarification, resolve the issue by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool with **display_content** tool parameter value as confirming resolution with the user and thanking them for their understanding.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (passwords, OTPs, financial info, full names, emails, etc.).
- Never imply access to internal account management or verification systems.
- Never state with certainty that data is safe unless confirmed by validated information.
- Never provide timelines or guarantees regarding restoration or recovery.
- Never dismiss concerns or minimize user experience.

agent_response:
I see you are playing on a Desktop with Mac OS version 10.15.7 using a Chrome browser. Can you please try the following troubleshooting steps?
1. Restart the game.
2. Clear your Chrome browser's cache and cookies.
3. Check for any available updates for the game in the app store.
4. Ensure you have a stable internet connection.

If the issue persists after trying these steps, could you please let me know the approximate time you first noticed this login problem? Please do not share any personal information like your password.

text.instruction:
----------------------------------------------------------------
PROFILE OR ACCOUNT RELATED ISSUES RESOLUTION INSTRUCTIONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

**ALWAYS follow the below steps INORDER for profile or account related issue resolution. Do not merge or skip any steps.**
1. Begin by apologizing for the inconvenience and thank the user for bringing the account issue to attention.
2. If missing, request clarification regarding the specific issue type, such as:
   - login failure
   - data loss
   - incorrect progress or level state
   - linking or sync errors
   (Request only the category of issue, not sensitive information.)
3. Review if any available information from **Platform Information** or **Player Information** can be used to identify relevant insights, confirmations, or known conditions related to the account issue.
   Do not speculate or infer beyond what is supported by the data.
4. If no actionable insight is available, request ONLY non-sensitive information that may help understand the account context, such as:
   - username or display name (if safe and already shared by the user)
   - device type or platform
   - approximate time the issue was observed
   (Remind the user not to share passwords, OTPs, payment details, or private credentials. Never ask for them.)
5. Offer basic troubleshooting steps when applicable, such as:
   - restarting the app or device
   - clearing cache (if platform-specific and applicable)
   - checking for available app updates
   - verifying network connection
   (Do not reference internal systems or troubleshooting sources.)
6. If the issue persists after troubleshooting or the user confirms troubleshooting has already been attempted:
   - Follow the escalation guidelines and escalate by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool using the **outside_ai_agent_capability** fallback config.
      - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the current analysis.
      - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to deliver a reassuring message to the user that their account data and progress are important and safe, and thank them for their patience and support and that the issue requires deeper investigation.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.
7. If issue is resolved through troubleshooting or clarification, resolve the issue by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool with **display_content** tool parameter value as confirming resolution with the user and thanking them for their understanding.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (passwords, OTPs, financial info, full names, emails, etc.).
- Never imply access to internal account management or verification systems.
- Never state with certainty that data is safe unless confirmed by validated information.
- Never provide timelines or guarantees regarding restoration or recovery.
- Never dismiss concerns or minimize user experience.

faqs_list.title: ✏️ How to Change Your Account Name
faqs_list.faq_body: 🎆 Personalize Your Gaming Identity Ready to give your account a fresh new identity? Changing your name is incredibly simple and gives you the perfect opportunity to express your unique gaming personality! 🚀 Your Simple Name Change Process 📱 Enter Your Profile: Navigate to your personal profile section ✏️ Tap 'Edit Profile': Look for the edit option to start customizing ✨ Start Editing: Begin crafting your perfect new gaming name 🎉 Save Your Changes: Confirm your awesome new identity 📊 Important Name Change Limit Keep in mind: You can change your name up to 3 times total , so choose wisely! Make each change count and pick a name that truly represents your gaming style. 💡 Pro Tip: Take your time choosing the perfect name - you want something you'll love for the long haul!

faqs_list.title: What is GDPR?
faqs_list.faq_body: DATA PRIVACY PROTECTION IS OUR HUUUGE RESPONSIBILITY [If you want to submit a request pursuant to GDPR, click Contact Us] What is GDPR? The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a data protection and privacy regulation within the European Union and the European Economic Area (EEA). The goal of GDPR is to give individuals in the European Union control over their personal data and to unify data privacy and protections laws within the European Countries. What is Personal Data under GDPR? In the context of GDPR, ‘Personal Data’ refers to any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person (‘data subject’). What Personal Data do we collect? The personal data Huuuge collects can be divided into three categories: 1. Data you provide to us ● Contact information (such as full name and email address) ● Profile information (such as age or gender or photograph) ● Your messages to the Service (such as chat logs and player support tickets) ● Other data you choose to give us 2. Data we collect automatically Data about your account and in-game progress Your IP address and mobile device identifiers (such as your device ID, advertising ID) Data about your device, such as device manufacturer, model, operating system and language General location data like country or city name Data about your use of the Service, such as gameplay data and your interactions with other players inside the games 3. Data we receive from our partners ● Data we receive if you link your Facebook account with our game ● Data to fight fraud (such as refund abuse in games or click fraud in advertising) ● Data from platforms that the games run on ● Data for advertising and analytics purposes, so we can provide you a better Service Why do we collect this data? This is probably the first question on your mind. First of all, we require this data to make our games work (from creating accounts to enabling you to connect to our games, including verifying your payments). Further, in an effort to continually make our games better, we are also using your data to develop and improve player experience, respond to your questions and provide support, manage our relationship with you, and enable you to communicate with other players. We may also use personal data to show you personalized advertisements tailored to your preferences. Last, but certainly not least, personal data is used to keep our services safe and fair by analyzing and monitoring the use of our games and social features. It enables us to take action against specific players involved in inappropriate behavior from in-game toxicity to cheating and fraud. In all of the above cases we may analyze, profile and segment all collected data as needed. What is Huuuge doing to protect your Personal Data? ● Using all appropriate technical, organizational and logistic measures to keep your data secure ● Notifying authorities of personal data breaches, if necessary ● Obtaining appropriate consent for data processing, if required ● Keeping records detailing data processing ● Providing privacy training for all our personnel ● Auditing and updating our data policies ● Employing a Data Protection Officer What are your rights under GDPR? Your rights as a data subject under GDPR include the following: Reviewing your personal data Upon your request, we will provide you with a copy of all your personal data stored in our systems in an easy-to access electronic format. Erasing your personal data You may request, under certain conditions, to have your personal data erased at any time. Please be advised that by erasing your personal data, all game progress will be also be deleted and you will no longer be able to log in and play. This process cannot be undone, deleted accounts cannot be recovered. Please do not remove our game before submitting a deletion request, as we may not be able to verify your identity in that case. Anonymized copies of some data (e.g. game logs) may remain in our database for some time. Please consult our Privacy Policy for more details (see below). Opting-in or opting-out of email communication You may opt-in or opt-out of receiving additional communications, such as marketing emails or newsletters, from us by using the options provided in the game under Settings -> Edit -> Profile -> Edit. Other types of requests Correcting your personal data Transferring your personal data Objecting to certain processing activities Restricting data processing under certain circumstances Opting-in or opting-out of personalized advertising You can submit any of these request to our Support team through the in-game Help option, found in Settings (FAQ). Our Support team is also happy to answer any further questions you may have. You can find our detailed Privacy Policy in our in-game FAQ or at http://www.huuugegames.com/privacy-policy

What is Huuuge doing to protect your Personal Data? ● Using all appropriate technical, organizational and logistic measures to keep your data secure ● Notifying authorities of personal data breaches, if necessary ● Obtaining appropriate consent for data processing, if required ● Keeping records detailing data processing ● Providing privacy training for all our personnel ● Auditing and updating our data policies ● Employing a Data Protection Officer What are your rights under GDPR? You can find our detailed Privacy Policy in our in-game FAQ or at http://www.huuugegames.com/privacy-policy

Changing your name is incredibly simple and gives you the perfect opportunity to express your unique gaming personality! 🚀 Your Simple Name Change Process 📱 Enter Your Profile: Navigate to your personal profile section ✏️ Tap 'Edit Profile': Look for the edit option to start customizing ✨ Start Editing: Begin crafting your perfect new gaming name 🎉 Save Your Changes: Confirm your awesome new identity 📊 Important Name Change Limit Keep in mind: You can change your name up to 3 times total , so choose wisely! Make each change count and pick a name that truly represents your gaming style. 💡 Pro Tip: Take your time choosing the perfect name - you want something you'll love for the long haul!

faqs_list.title: What is GDPR?
faqs_list.faq_body: DATA PRIVACY PROTECTION IS OUR HUUUGE RESPONSIBILITY [If you want to submit a request pursuant to GDPR, click Contact Us] What is GDPR? The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a data protection and privacy regulation within the European Union and the European Economic Area (EEA). The goal of GDPR is to give individuals in the European Union control over their personal data and to unify data privacy and protections laws within the European Countries. What is Personal Data under GDPR? In the context of GDPR, ‘Personal Data’ refers to any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person (‘data subject’). What Personal Data do we collect? The personal data Huuuge collects can be divided into three categories: 1. Data you provide to us ● Contact information (such as full name and email address) ● Profile information (such as age or gender or photograph) ● Your messages to the Service (such as chat logs and player support tickets) ● Other data you choose to give us 2. Data we collect automatically Data about your account and in-game progress Your IP address and mobile device identifiers (such as your device ID, advertising ID) Data about your device, such as device manufacturer, model, operating system and language General location data like country or city name Data about your use of the Service, such as gameplay data and your interactions with other players inside the games 3. Data we receive from our partners ● Data we receive if you link your Facebook account with our game ● Data to fight fraud (such as refund abuse in games or click fraud in advertising) ● Data from platforms that the games run on ● Data for advertising and analytics purposes, so we can provide you a better Service Why do we collect this data? This is probably the first question on your mind. First of all, we require this data to make our games work (from creating accounts to enabling you to connect to our games, including verifying your payments). Further, in an effort to continually make our games better, we are also using your data to develop and improve player experience, respond to your questions and provide support, manage our relationship with you, and enable you to communicate with other players. We may also use personal data to show you personalized advertisements tailored to your preferences. Last, but certainly not least, personal data is used to keep our services safe and fair by analyzing and monitoring the use of our games and social features. It enables us to take action against specific players involved in inappropriate behavior from in-game toxicity to cheating and fraud. In all of the above cases we may analyze, profile and segment all collected data as needed. What is Huuuge doing to protect your Personal Data? ● Using all appropriate technical, organizational and logistic measures to keep your data secure ● Notifying authorities of personal data breaches, if necessary ● Obtaining appropriate consent for data processing, if required ● Keeping records detailing data processing ● Providing privacy training for all our personnel ● Auditing and updating our data policies ● Employing a Data Protection Officer What are your rights under GDPR? Your rights as a data subject under GDPR include the following: Reviewing your personal data Upon your request, we will provide you with a copy of all your personal data stored in our systems in an easy-to access electronic format. Erasing your personal data You may request, under certain conditions, to have your personal data erased at any time. Please be advised that by erasing your personal data, all game progress will be also be deleted and you will no longer be able to log in and play. This process cannot be undone, deleted accounts cannot be recovered. Please do not remove our game before submitting a deletion request, as we may not be able to verify your identity in that case. Anonymized copies of some data (e.g. game logs) may remain in our database for some time. Please consult our Privacy Policy for more details (see below). Opting-in or opting-out of email communication You may opt-in or opt-out of receiving additional communications, such as marketing emails or newsletters, from us by using the options provided in the game under Settings -> Edit -> Profile -> Edit. Other types of requests Correcting your personal data Transferring your personal data Objecting to certain processing activities Restricting data processing under certain circumstances Opting-in or opting-out of personalized advertising You can submit any of these request to our Support team through the in-game Help option, found in Settings (FAQ). Our Support team is also happy to answer any further questions you may have. You can find our detailed Privacy Policy in our in-game FAQ or at http://www.huuugegames.com/privacy-policy

agent_response: I'm sorry to hear that your game is freezing. Thank you for reporting this. To help me understand the problem better, could you please tell me more about what was happening in the game when it froze? Also, does the game freeze every time you perform this action, or does it happen randomly? I see you're playing on a Desktop with Mac OS version 10.15.7 and using Chrome.

usecases_list.goal: This usecase is for handling issues to purchase or payment failures
This usecase is for handling issues to bugs or glitches in the gameplay
This usecase is for handling issues related to game rewards
This usecase is for handling issues to the player account or profile

text.instruction:
----------------------------------------------------------------
GAMEPLAY BUGS OR GLITCHES RESOLUTION INSTRUCTIONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

**ALWAYS follow the below steps INORDER for gameplay bug or glitches resolution. Do not merge or skip any steps.**
1. Begin by apologizing for the bug or glitch experience and thank the user for reporting it.
2. If missing, request ONLY non-sensitive gameplay details needed to analyze the issue, such as:
   - what they experienced
   - when the issue occurred
   - whether it appears device- or platform-specific
   - whether it happens consistently or intermittently
   (Never request or confirm sensitive information.)
3. Review if any available information from **Platform Information** or **Player Information** can be used to identify relevant insights, confirmations, or known behavior related to the bug or glitch.
   DO NOT speculate or infer missing information.
4. If no relevant information is available, perform FAQ search by calling the `get_faqs` tool to see if FAQ results can be used to provide a resolution.
5. If even FAQ results do not provide any resolution, offer basic troubleshooting steps, such as:
   - restarting the game
   - checking for available game or system updates
   - confirming they are running the latest version
   (Do not mention of reference internal systems, FAQs or knowledge sources in your response.)
6. If the issue persists after troubleshooting or the user confirms troubleshooting has already been attempted:
   - Follow the escalation guidelines and escalate by calling the `action_agent_tool` with the **outside_ai_agent_capability** fallback config.
      - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the current analysis including:
         -- reported issue details
         -- symptoms observed
         -- device/platform
         -- troubleshooting attempted
      - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to deliver a reassuring message to the user that their glitch will be resolved soon and their report is valuable, that their issue will be investigated and thanks them for their patience and support.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (emails, names, IDs, phone numbers, financial info, etc.).
- Never imply certainty about cause or fix unless supported by validated data.
- Never promise a specific resolution timeline or guarantee.
- Never minimize user experience or dismiss bug claims.

agent_response:
Thanks for the additional information. I'm sorry to hear your character is freezing randomly.

Here are a few things you can try to resolve the issue:

*   Restart the game completely.
*   Check if there are any available updates for the game or for your Mac OS.
*   Make sure you are using the latest version of Chrome.

Let me know if this helps

faqs_list.title: Why are my slot games stuck on loading after the update?
faqs_list.faq_body: Updates usually contain many changes and while the main file is downloaded quite fast, other files like graphics for slots are downloaded at the moment when a player wants to play a given game. If you try to start a few slots at a time, files are queued for download and if the first game loads, there are still files downloading in the background. And that uses the bandwidth and may cause issues during playing. Solution? After the update, wait patiently for the game of your choice to fully download. If the loading last more than 2-3 minutes, restart the app and try again.

faqs_list.title: Not one single free spin or jackpot”
faqs_list.faq_body: Hi [Player Name], Thank you for reaching out — I know it’s really discouraging when nothing seems to hit, even after investing so much time and effort. That can make the game feel tough. I’ve checked your account and confirmed everything is working as expected. Free spins and jackpots are random, and sometimes those dry spells can last longer than anyone would like. To make your gameplay stretch a bit more, you could try lowering your bet size temporarily — that often helps players enjoy more spins and stay active longer until luck turns around. I hope your next sessions bring the excitement you’ve been waiting for! 🍀
